title: 1936년 Strong 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Strong. 판결일: 1936-04-08. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STRONG v. STATE
**판결일**: 1936-04-08
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Christian, Morrow

## 변호인

Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 93 S.W.2d 411

## 판결문 요약


CHRISTIAN, Judge.
The offense is burglary; the punishment, confinement in the penitentiary for five years.
The record is before us without a statement of facts or bills of exception. N.o question is presented for review.
The judgment is affirmed.
MORROW, P. J., absent.
PER CURIAM.
The foregoing opinion of the Commission of Appeals has been examined by the judges of the Court of Criminal Appeals and approved by the court.
...
